languages.text: {n}Маражай вдруг меняется в лице — от глумливой ухмылки не остается и следа, его внимательный взгляд впивается в Гемункула.{/n} "В шпиль Опустошительной бури? Прятаться под крыло Иремерисс, архонта, впавшего в опалу? Какой неосмотрительный выбор. Тебе надлежало бы бежать прочь от нее и ее проблем... если только ты не связан с тем, в чем повинна она".

{n}Marazhai's face suddenly changes. His mocking grin gone, he fixes his gaze on the Haemonculus.{/n} "Into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, an Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to her crime."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай вдруг меняется в лице — от глумливой ухмылки не остается и следа, его внимательный взгляд впивается в Гемункула.{/n} "В шпиль Опустошительной бури? Прятаться под крыло Иремерисс, архонта, впавшего в опалу? Какой неосмотрительный выбор. Тебе надлежало бы бежать прочь от нее и ее проблем... если только ты не связан с тем, в чем повинна она".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's face suddenly changes. His mocking grin gone, he fixes his gaze on the haemonculus.{/n} "Into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, a Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to what she is guilty of."

You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to what she is guilty of."

You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to what she is guilty of."

You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to what she is guilty of."

To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, an Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to her crime."

{n}Marazhai's face suddenly changes. His mocking grin gone, he fixes his gaze on the Haemonculus.{/n} "Into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, an Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to her crime."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの表情が突然変わった。あざ笑うような笑みは消え、視線をハモンキュラスに向ける。{/n}「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔へ？不名誉に堕ちたアーコン、イレメリスの下に身を隠すためか？なんという軽率な選択だ。彼女の犯した罪と何らかの関係がない限り、問題からは距離を置くべきだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face suddenly changes. His mocking grin gone, he fixes his gaze on the Haemonculus.{/n} "Into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, an Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to her crime."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの表情が突然変わった。あざ笑うような笑みは消え、視線をハモンキュラスに向ける。{/n}「リーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔へ？不名誉に堕ちたアーコン、イレメリスの下に身を隠すためか？なんという軽率な選択だ。彼女の罪と何らかの関係がない限り、問題からは距離を置くべきだ」

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋突然变了脸色。他那嘲弄的笑容消失了，注意力集中在了眼前的血伶人身上。{/n}“你打算进入狂风阴谋团的尖塔，躲在伊芮梅莉斯的羽翼之下？接受那个名誉扫地的执政官的庇护？真是个愚蠢的选择。你应该尽可能远离她和她惹下的麻烦，除非你和她的罪行之间存在着某种联系。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face suddenly changes. His mocking grin gone, he fixes his gaze on the Haemonculus.{/n} "Into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, an Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to her crime."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋突然变了脸色。他那嘲弄的笑容消失了，注意力集中在了眼前的血伶人身上。{/n}“你打算进入狂风阴谋团的尖塔，躲在伊芮梅莉斯的羽翼之下？接受那个名誉扫地的执政官的庇护？真是个愚蠢的选择。你应该尽可能远离她和她惹下的麻烦，除非你和她的罪行之间存在着某种联系。”

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Marazhai cambia de repente. Su sonrisa burlona desaparece y fija su mirada en el Hemónculo.{/n} «¿En la Torre de la Tempestad Asoladora? ¿Para esconderte bajo la supervisión de Yremeryss, una Arconte caída en desgracia? Qué elección tan imprudente. Deberías huir de ella y de sus problemas, a menos que tenga algún tipo de relación con sus crímenes».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face suddenly changes. His mocking grin gone, he fixes his gaze on the Haemonculus.{/n} "Into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, an Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to her crime."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Marazhai cambia de repente. Su sonrisa burlona desaparece y fija su mirada en el Hemónculo.{/n} «¿En la Torre de la Tempestad Asoladora? ¿Para esconderse bajo la supervisión de Yremeryss, una Arconte caída en desgracia? Qué elección tan imprudente. Deberías huir de ella y de sus problemas, a menos que tenga algún tipo de relación con lo que ha hecho».

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich ändert sich Marazhais Miene. Sein spöttisches Grinsen ist verschwunden und er fixiert mit seinem Blick den Haemonculus.{/n} "In den Turm des plündernden Sturms? Um sich unter der Fittiche von Yremeryss zu verstecken, einer in Ungnade gefallenen Archontin? Eine äußerst unkluge Wahl. Ihr solltet vor ihr und ihren Sorgen weglaufen, sofern Ihr nichts mit ihrem Verbrechen zu tun habt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face suddenly changes. His mocking grin gone, he fixes his gaze on the Haemonculus.{/n} "Into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, an Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to her crime."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Miene ändert sich plötzlich. Sein spöttisches Grinsen ist verschwunden und er fixiert mit seinem Blick den Haemonculus.{/n} "In den Turm des plündernden Sturms? Um sich unter der Fittiche von Yremeryss zu verstecken, einer in Ungnade gefallenen Archontin? Eine äußerst unkluge Wahl. Ihr solltet vor ihr und ihren Sorgen davonrennen, wenn Ihr nicht irgendwie mit den Taten verbunden seid, derer sie schuldig ist."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai change subitement d'expression. Son sourire moqueur disparu, il garde les yeux rivés sur l'hémoncule.{/n} « La tour de la Tempête ravageuse ? Pour vous cacher derrière Yremeryss, une archonte tombée en disgrâce ? Un choix des plus imprudents. À moins que vous ne trempiez dans ses manigances, je ne saurais que trop vous conseiller de la fuir comme la peste. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face suddenly changes. His mocking grin gone, he fixes his gaze on the Haemonculus.{/n} "Into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, an Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to her crime."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai change subitement d'expression. Son sourire moqueur disparu, il ne détache plus le regard de l'hémoncule.{/n} « La tour de la Tempête ravageuse ? Pour vous cacher derrière Yremeryss, une archonte tombée en disgrâce ? Un choix des plus imprudents. À moins que vous ne trempiez dans ses manigances, je ne saurai que trop vous conseiller de la fuir comme la peste. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzü anında değişiyor. Alaycı sırıtışı yok oluyor ve bakışları Haimonkulus'a kilitleniyor.{/n} "Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ne mi? Yremeryss'in, gözden düşen bir Arkon'un kanatları altında saklanmaya mı? Ne kadar da mantıksız bir seçim. Ondan ve onun dertlerinden uzak durmalısın. Tabii işlediği suçla bir şekilde bağlantılı değilsen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face suddenly changes. His mocking grin gone, he fixes his gaze on the Haemonculus.{/n} "Into the Spire of the Reaving Tempest? To hide under the wing of Yremeryss, an Archon fallen into disgrace? What an imprudent choice. You should run away from her and her troubles, unless you are somehow connected to her crime."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzü anında değişiyor. Alaycı sırıtışı yok oluyor ve bakışları Haimonkulus'a kilitleniyor.{/n} "Müfteris Kasırga Kulesi'ne mi? Yremeryss'in, gözden düşen bir Arkon'un kanatları altında saklanmaya mı? Ne kadar da mantıksız bir seçim. Ondan ve onun dertlerinden uzak durmalısın. Tabii işlediği suçla bir şekilde bağlantılı değilsen."
